description: This file provides a helper function for managing session identifiers in a calculator web application. It generates and retrieves a stable session ID stored in localStorage, ensuring consistency across page refreshes, and falls back to a temporary ID if localStorage is inaccessible.

methods.name: getOrCreateSessionId()
methods.description: Returns a stable session ID string for the current browser session. Creates a new ID if none exists in localStorage, otherwise retrieves the existing one. Uses crypto.randomUUID() when available, otherwise generates an ID based on timestamp and randomness. Falls back to a temporary ID if accessing localStorage fails.
